coreAtributes.name: Ambassador Robe
coreAtributes.description: A long-sleeved robe with a metallic belt. It is primarily worn by Ambassadors from the Angel-dominated land of Alderaan.

displacementText.playerSelf: You slip off your Ambassador's Robe.
You pull up the lower half of your Ambassador's Robe.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull up the lower half of [npc.name]'s Ambassador's Robe.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You flip up the lower half of [npc.name]'s Ambassador's Robe impatiently.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls up the lower half of [npc.her] Ambassador's Robe.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls up the lower half of your Ambassador's Robe.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] flips up the lower half of your Ambassador's Robe impatiently.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls up the lower half of [npc2.name]'s Ambassador's Robe.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] flips up the lower half of [npc2.name]'s Ambassador's Robe.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slip on the Ambassador's Robe.
replacementText.playerNPC: You slip on the Ambassador's Robe on [npc.name].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You slip on the Ambassador's Robe on [npc.name].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slips on the Ambassador's Robe on you.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] slips on the Ambassador's Robe impatiently.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slips on the Ambassador's Robe on [npc2.name].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] slips on the Ambassador's Robe impatiently on [npc2.name].

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull the Ambassador's Robe back down into its proper position.
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull [npc.name]'s Ambassador's Robe back down into its proper position.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You pull [npc.name]'s Ambassador's Robe back down into its proper position quickly.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] Ambassador's Robe back down into its proper position.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls the Ambassador's Robe back down into its proper position.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] pulls the Ambassador's Robe back down into its proper position quickly.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls [npc2.name]'s Ambassador's Robe back down into its proper position.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] pulls [npc2.name]'s Ambassador's Robe back down into its proper position quickly.
